pr_title: [CDAP-17063] Add additional functionalities to improve user experience (RequestHistoryTab)

timeline.message: Add additional functionalities to improve user experience (RequestHistoryTab)
[CDAP-17063] Add additional functionalities to improve user experience (RequestHistoryTab)

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should leave off the reference to the CDAP account, so this message makes sense in CDF as well, i.e. "Are you sure you want to clear all your request history?"
timeline.author: yukiej
yukiej
yukiej

replies.bodyText: Which variable are you referring to?
replies.author: jennac3

replies.bodyText: I meant the request methods, but it looks like you are already doing it so maybe I was looking in the wrong place or saw something outdated. So no change needed!
replies.author: yukiej

timeline.author: elfenheart
elfenheart
